Yetis Vs Hunters - Improved Kill Streak
Yetis Vs Hunters - Meurtres en série améliorés
Yetis gegen Jäger – Verbesserte Trefferserie
Yeti contro Cacciatori: bonus uccisioni consecutive
Yetis contra cazadores: mejora de racha asesina
Yetis Vs Hunters - Improved Kill Streak
설인 Vs 사냥꾼 - 연속 킬 향상
Yetis Vs Hunters - Improved Kill Streak
雪人VS獵人－改良版連擊道具
雪人VS獵人－改良版連擊道具
Yetis Vs Hunters - Improved Kill Streak
kDesc
Increases the time frame, from 5 seconds to 10 seconds, for a kill to count towards the current kill streak. The effect lasts for an entire round of play. (10 pack) [#Legal]
Augmente le délai de 5 à 10 secondes pour qu'un meurtre soit comptabilisé dans la série en cours. L'effet reste actif pendant toute la durée du tour. (Pack de 10) [#Legal]
Erhöht den Zeitrahmen, in dem ein Treffer zur aktuellen Trefferserie gezählt wird, von 5 auf 10 Sekunden. Dieser Effekt hält eine ganze Spielrunde an. (10er-Pack) [#Legal]
Aumenta il periodo di tempo in cui un'uccisione può essere conteggiata nella serie di uccisioni consecutive, da 5 a 10 secondi. L'effetto rimane attivo per tutto il round. (10 usi) [#Legal]
Aumenta el tiempo de actuación de 5 a 10 segundos para que una muerte cuente en esa racha asesina. El efecto dura toda una ronda. (pack de 10) [#Legal]
Increases the time frame, from 5 seconds to 10 seconds, for a kill to count towards the current kill streak. The effect lasts for an entire round of play. (10 pack) [#Legal]
연속 킬을 성공할 수 있는 시간이 5초에서 10초로 증가합니다. 이 효과는 한 라운드 동안 지속됩니다. (10개) [#Legal]
Increases the time frame, from 5 seconds to 10 seconds, for a kill to count towards the current kill streak. The effect lasts for an entire round of play. (10 pack) [#Legal]
讓連擊時間計量表延長，從5秒變成10秒。效果是從殺敵數計算開始至使用時的殺敵連擊。在一場完整的回合中都能發揮效力。(使用次數：10次)[#Legal]
讓連擊時間計量表延長，從5秒變成10秒。效果是從殺敵數計算開始至使用時的殺敵連擊。在一場完整的回合中都能發揮效力。(使用次數：10次)[#Legal]
Increases the time frame, from 5 seconds to 10 seconds, for a kill to count towards the current kill streak. The effect lasts for an entire round of play. (10 pack) [#Legal]
